config.title: Create Professional Digital Business Cards in Minutes
config.subtitle: Transform your networking with smart vCards. Share your contact info instantly via QR code, NFC, or link. No app required for recipients.

config.title: Everything You Need for Modern Networking

items.title: Instant Sharing
items.description: Share your contact details with a simple tap, scan, or click. Works on any device.

items.title: Always Updated
items.description: Update your info once and it reflects everywhere. No more outdated business cards.

items.title: Contact Management
items.description: Track who viewed your card and manage your professional network efficiently.

items.title: Custom Templates
items.description: Choose from 50+ professional templates or create your own unique design.

items.title: Analytics Dashboard
items.description: See how many people viewed your card and track your networking success.

items.title: Team Management
items.description: Create and manage vCards for your entire team from one central dashboard.
